org.opendaylight.controller.containermanager

Interface IContainerManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContainerManager

    public interface IContainerManager
    Container Manager provides an ability for the Network Administrators to partitions a production network into smaller, isolated and manageable networks. IContainerManager interface exposes these Container management capabilities via the supported APIs
